entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
